rules_text:
Mill two cards, then return target instant, saga, or sorcery from your graveyard to your hand.
Exile Reminiscent Tune.
special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after II)[/i]
Create a Murmur token. [i](It's a colorless Saga Murmur enchantment with “{2I},{3I}– Add {C}.”)[/i]
Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
[i]You do not recognize the melody in the murmur.[/i]
